info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 23 at 4:04PM EST until December 24 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory. Snow accumulations of between 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In Southern Vermont, Bennington County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM EST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
